articles.content: I am 58 years old. In addition to my debt investments, I would like to create a corpus of 10 crore in the next 10 years. I have 5 lakh invested in Parag Parikh Flexi Cap Fund, 5 lakh in Axis Bluechip… [+1680 chars]
